column5: My son and I had a great trip at an outpost.  We caught over 500 Walleye and Pike in a week.  A bear also got very interesting.  Biggest Pike was 41 inches 18 lbs.  http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/uploads..._319_154758.jpg[/img]
Did ya keep 'im?
Good stuff, but where are the pics???  Maureen
There was a picture of the fine young man holding a pike almost bigger then  him, but as soon as I hit refresh button it'se disapeared  :dunno:  . I do not know what's happened ?   Does it matter???
Keram  GCD's joking about the bear...................  Great report where did you fly out of? Looks like a beauty place.
Flew out of Red Lake
500 fish in a week      ... no time to rest between casts.  Sure do sound like a ton of fun and congrats on a great week.  Coool seeing your pics.  Thanks much.
Some good fishin, thanks for the report and pic's...
Looks like a great trip with your boy.....  dk
Sounds like a great trip, thats pic of your son with the pike nearly as big as him is priceless
Great pictures.  Your son must be beaming.  That is a huge pike for him.  Joey
Dang, I hate it when dem der bars get up close and personal. Looks like a great trip...
Gotta luv the fly-in outpost camps eh! My wife and I did one out of Elliot Lake on our honeymoon. Nice work on the numbers. That pike will be a long lasting memory for you and your son. AWESOME.
Nice trip for you and your son.  Thanks for bringing us the report.
Over 500 pike and walleye in a week... WOW! I have yet to hook into one, hopefully tmrw at LoveSick Lake after I've caught my limit of bass.
Beanhead  A pic of the pike we talked about is here

Wow, that's one heck of a Pike!!!  I'd be thrilled to get something like that...your son must still be talking about that trip...what a great memory for him!  and you!!! Thanks for posting the pics.  Maureen
500?? That's more fish than I've caught TOTAL!! LOL.  Great trip and great pics.  It's great you got to spend that time out there with your son...he must have had a great time!
I'm thinking that this was another Boois trip, as they have an outpost on Joyce lake.  Glad to hear that your trip went so well.
Holy Pike!  500 fish in a week! thats crazy!  Between 2 people at 8hrs a day for 7days thats an average of 1 fish per every 10minutes.  Thats my kind of fishin!

It was a really amazing.  We would find a weed bed where we would catch a Walleye or get a bite a on every cast with the occasional pike- over 30 inches.  Since when do they hang out together?  When we fished in weed beds we used Johnson silver Minnows with a yellow twister tail.  My son pointed to an eagle and told me to get a picture.  While I was messing with the camera a fish hit my silver minnow dangling in the water next to the boat.  I almost lost my rod.  It was a 36 inch pike!  We have already set up our reservations at the same place for next July.  God blessed sunset country in Ontario.
Got to love those outpost lakes! Awesome report and I'm sure it's one that your son will not forget. Congrats!  Whopper  PS those pike aren't hanging with the walleye that's their dinner
